p: We adapted the Kwon et al. mathematical model of parenteral HIV transmission among PWID to estimate HIV incidence 12. This is a cohort‐type model that assumes that sharing of needles/syringes occurs in groups of specific size, where PWID share in random order, and where each PWID injects once per sharing event. HIV transmissions through sharing needles/syringes can then occur in groups containing an infected person.
